title: Implement open photo gallery functionality from HTML
description: Add functionality to open the device's photo gallery from the HTML interface, allowing users to select photos through the Flutter app
acceptance_criteria: HTML button successfully triggers Flutter to open the device photo gallery
Selected photos are accessible in the Flutter application

steps: Create a button in HTML to open the photo gallery
Add JavaScript to call Flutter when button is clicked
Implement Flutter method to handle the JavaScript call
Add native code to open the device photo gallery
Handle photo selection and return data to Flutter
ai_instructions.additional_notes: Use the existing project architecture patterns. Ensure proper error handling and loading states.
